title: Low Fps late game
body: I have always had pretty good fps with 0 issues. But lately every game I will randomly drop to 4 fps and it stays there for awhile. ALWAYS happens late game, I need to pay more attention but I am pretty sure it always happens when super minions spawn. Anyone else having this issue or have any ideas?

replies.body: If you're noticing it all the time with the super minions, it might have something to do with a corrupted file pertaining to those minions. We can try running a repair through the client settings, but also be sure to check out this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to hit the most common sources of fps issues if that repair doesn't help!
Yes its every time super minions spawn i get 3-5 fps till they are gone. Followed the fps guide when i first started having the problem but it did not help.

Since the steps in that guide didn't seem to help at all, let's try doing a repair through the game client settings if you haven't yet. If the problem does lie with the game files that pertain to super minions, a repair should do the trick. If that repair doesn't help, go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can take a closer look with you!

https://i.gyazo.com/55404cf76bde6355c9900f76f81eec31.png
